function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Primary agricultural producers unable to sell produce due to movement control orders and travel restrictions.","Impact":"Loss of income and waste of perishable produce.","Mitigation":"Establish online platforms for direct sales to customers and use delivery services for transportation.","Technologies":"Online retail platforms, delivery services.","People":"Primary agricultural producers, online retailers, customers.","Owner":"Online retailers, delivery services."},{"Description":"Surge in demand for online grocery shopping leading to unprepared online retailers and insufficient delivery capacity.","Impact":"Customers unable to get their orders delivered, retailers unable to meet demand.","Mitigation":"Increase delivery capacity, make changes to online retail operations.","Technologies":"Online retail platforms, delivery systems.","People":"Online grocery retailers, customers.","Owner":"Online grocery retailers."}]}
